- You were admitted to Metriport-OrgA-1651 on 10/2/2012 with a diagnosis of left maxillary sinus mass. You underwent a biopsy of the sinus mass and were treated with IV antibiotics.
- You tolerated the procedure without complications and your condition improved. You were discharged from Metriport-OrgA-1651 on 10/5/2012 with instructions to follow up with Dr. Rodriguez.
- Should you have any questions prior to discharge, please contact a member of your healthcare team. If you have left the hospital and have any questions, please contact your primary care physician.
- No heavy lifting, straining, or nose blowing.

td.content: Call your primary care physician or return to the emergency room
if you experience any of the following symptoms:

tr.td: - Pain or redness at the site of any previous intravenous catheter.

- Schedule a follow up appointment with your primary care physician in one week.
